data.text: @alanhenney People really make dumb choices, snap decisions with no knowledge behind it at all. So unnecessary. I hope they had cameras at the establishment or use of the many nearby.
@alanhenney This makes no sense.  These owners are US Citizens and have nothing to do with the Russian Government.
@alanhenney People that target Russian businesses (I am aware this isnâ€™t Russian owned) are so woefully misinformed. Not a good look DC, do better.

@alanhenney The co-owners are an American and a Lithuanian, who happens to really like traditional Russian food:

https://t.co/fW65FSdOfp
@alanhenney A reminder too that many Russians are protesting across Russia and being arrested en mass.
@alanhenney I drove by Saturday and wondered when that was going to happen
